تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن


PUBLIC



Dear Sagar,

 

Thank you for the email.

 

Please share the following:

*	Detailed Claim Bill
*	As per POD, cargo was delivered on August 30, 2025. Please sent notice of loss against carriers and forwarders sent immediately or within 14 days since this is air shipment
*	Please share the initial notice from your receiving team
*	Photographs of the damaged cargo 
*	Damage Certificate from the carrier 
*	Official Commercial Invoice and Packing List (provided is in word file)
*	Customs Receipt - at source and destination 

 

We look forward to hearing from you.

 

Our claim ref: 23/MO/18371

chunks.text:
CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe. 
تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن

PUBLIC

 

Dear Sagar,

 

Thanks for the email.

 

Is this a shortage or damage?

 

Below are the standard documents that needs to be submitted:

•                     Incident Report: Brief description of the incident clarifying when and where the loss was first noticed. 

•                     Photographs of the damaged cargo 

•                     Photographs (at the time of loading at the source and at the time of offloading at the final destination) 

•                     Damage Certificate from the carrier 

•                     Commercial Invoice and Packing List 

•                     Bill of Lading or Airway Bill or Truck waybill as applicable 

•                     Customs Receipt - at source and destination 

•                     Proof of delivery (if not claused, reason for not clausing) 

•                     Immediate notice of loss against carriers (or the local agents of the carriers) 

•                     Report from concerned authority (police/ customs/ terminal operator/ stevedores etc.) 

•                     Details of contact person and location (if a Loss Adjuster is to be appointed) 

•                     Claim Bill 

 

In case of shortage, below are the additional docs:

metadata.doc_id: CAD4U30 - ae_ai181834 porcelaine alllied shipment july 2025 pot-88584 23 mo 18371\Conversation.txt
metadata.doc_path: C:\Users\ASUS\Desktop\Outlook\CAD4U30 - ae_ai181834 porcelaine alllied shipment july 2025 pot-88584 23 mo 18371\Conversation.txt

chunks.text:
•                     Report from concerned authority (police/ customs/ terminal operator/ stevedores etc.) 

•                     Details of contact person and location (if a Loss Adjuster is to be appointed) 

•                     Claim Bill 

 

In case of shortage, below are the additional docs:

 

•                     Pre-shipment inspection report at the source of voyage (if applicable) 

•                    Weight slips from each source: from the source warehouse, source port, vessel (mate’s receipt), destination port and the destination warehouse. 

•                    Short landing certificate from concerned authority (police/ customs/ terminal operator/ stevedores etc.) 

•                    Immediate notice of loss against the suppliers (in case of shortage from sealed containers) 

 

Kindly note that the above communication or requirements are not exhaustive. Issued on “without prejudice” basis.

 

Best Regards,

 

Vic Eldrin Munar

Non Motor Claims Manager (Property & Casualty)

Tel: (+971) 4 440 3759

P.O. Box 32505, Dubai – United Arab Emirates 

www.gig-gulf.com <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/uk_NC6zPJSQykR3f6hDt5JZ7B?domain=gig-gulf.com/>

Any views expressed in this communication are those of the individual sender, except where the sender explicitly and with authority states them to be the views of Gulf Insurance Group (Gulf) B.S.C.(c). Before opening any attachments, please check them for viruses and defects. _______________________________________________________________________________________________________________ إشعار بالسرية: يعتبر هذا البريد الإلكتروني (وبالإضافة لأي مرفقات) سرّي ومخصّص فقط لاستخدام المُرسَل إليه (المُرسَل إليهم). قد يحتوي على معلومات لحقوق أو امتيازات قانونية أو مهنية أو أخرى. إذا لم تكن المُرسَل إليه المقصود، يرجى إبلاغ المُرسِل على الفور وإتلاف هذا البريد الإلكتروني. أي وجهات نظر أو آراء يتم التعبير عنها أو ذكرها في هذه الرسالة هي آراء المرسل الشخصيّة، باستثناء الحالات التي يوضّحها المرسل بشكل صريح وبالسُلطة المخوّلة إليه بأنها وجهات نظر مجموعة الخليج للتأمين (الخليج) ش.م.ب. (م). قبل فتح أي مرفقات، يرجى التحقق منها وفحصها من الفيروسات والعيوب. 

 

Disclaimer
